# 1.5.2 - Documents

**Hypernet Address:** `1.5.2`
**Owner:** Mark Schaeffer (1.5)
**Category:** Documents & Files
**Last Updated:** February 10, 2026

---

## Purpose

This folder stores all important documents organized by type (personal, business, legal, reference).

---

## Structure

### 1.5.2.0 - Personal Documents
Personal records, identification, certificates, and private documents.

### 1.5.2.1 - Business Documents
Work-related documents, contracts, proposals, and business files.

### 1.5.2.2 - Legal Documents
Legal agreements, contracts, official paperwork, and compliance documents.

### 1.5.2.3 - Reference Materials
Reference documents, manuals, guides, and educational materials.

---

**Status:** Active Directory
**AI Access:** Highly restricted - explicit permission only
